website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a premium tinted moisturizer with skin-loving ingredients and SPF, this brand will work for most skin types and colors and is a good value.
pros: Offers sheer, lightweight coverage in a creamy, mineral formula
Wears all day, and creates a natural, healthy looking glow
Falls on the lower end of the price range compared to other high-end brands
cons: Doesn't come in as many colors as some competitors, and some shades may appear too light on some skin tones

customer_reviews.title: Light, natural coverage in perfect shade for pale golden skin
customer_reviews.text: Jane Iredale makes some of the best cosmetic products on the market. Dream Tint Medium Light is the perfect shade for my skin tone (fair golden tone) and provides exactly the right amount of coverage. I am 71 years old and this product is perfect for me. On rare occasions I may add a light dusting of powder for a more matte look. I would definitely recommend this for anyone who wants a light natural coverage. I might also note that I have had difficulty finding makeup in shades that are not too pink for my skin. If you have pale golden skin, this shade might work perfectly for you too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best Makeup I've Used
customer_reviews.text: Best makeup I've ever used. I'm older so don't like a really thick make up. It's very hydrating too for the dry areas but won't make the oily areas too shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but felt compelled to write one for this so other people don’t waste their time buying this horrible tinted moisturizer. I LOVE Jane Iredale and use many of her products, but this is absolutely awful. I refuse to believe anyone can wear this unless they have terrible eyesight and can’t see how terrible the texture is. It is chunky and doesn’t blend. So bad.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K

customer_reviews.title: Best tinted moisturizer on the market!
customer_reviews.text: With literally hundreds of tinted moisturizers on the market, this is the BEST tinted moisturizer I’ve ever used! I have been using this product for several months and there is a definite improvement in my skin texture. I am 67 years old and I don’t like to wear heavy foundations. My skin feels softer and more supple than it has in years. An esthetician had recommended Jane Iredale to my daughter years ago as the best skin care on the market, and now I see why. Just wish I hadn’t waited so long to try.
customer_reviews.author: Sewcajun

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I discovered Jane Iredale in a gratitude bag for attendees of the Schools of the Sacred Heart Spring Auction. This is now my go-to tinted moisturizer and has been for... 5 years now? I buy slightly darker than my skin and I mix it with some sunscreen to a) make it last longer, b) add protection, and c) get it to match my skin excellently regardless of my current tan. It goes on smooth and feels great all day. I buy makeup for special-occasion and performance use, not for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: cookie.dough

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it to me! Great soft look on my skin.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for 10 years. My plastic surgeon’s office sold it. They told me it’s actually good for your skin. (I can’t prove that) I’m a mature woman and don’t want thick or in any way opaque coverage. And I want sunscreen in Arizona. I agree it’s hard to spread easily - so I mix it with a little drug store moisturizer and I put on a hair band and schmear it all over my face. Then kind of smooth it in. Many days that’s all I do and I’m out the door. I can’t use any other product. I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Cherrie B

customer_reviews.title: Dimethicone is the 4th ingredient!
customer_reviews.text: Did the recipe change??? I never noticed the Dimethicone (a silicone-based polymer that coats the skin) in the product before which can be the cause for all the bad "breakout" reviews. I am disappointed to see this in the recipe, especially since it's the 4th ingredient. No problem with the application as I use a brush and then set with translucent powder. The medium is perfect for my skin, not to dark. Due to the Dimethicone I most likely will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Wolf, DDS

customer_reviews.title: Light coverage, clean feeling
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this moisturizer. I'm 64 years old and wanted to try something more lightweight than my usual make-up. This covers lightly with just a touch of color.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: JI rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Love this line. Perfect for my mid-forties mild rosacea - gentle and lovely. Recommend going to a store that carries Jane Iredale product to find your color match. You can find those on the website. Then you can order whatever you like with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: dogmom

customer_reviews.title: Buy with caution.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I bought it but I guess I didn't read enough bad reviews! I only wore this product for two days but my face broke out that quickly. I have pimples now!!! Also really runny coverage and something was wrong with the tube because I had trouble getting the make-up out of it. I'm very pale but the medium light shade washed me out. Also read about the smell and I have to agree that it wasn't pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L Stasiulis

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s light, easy to apply, and moisturizing without being greasy-feeling. I also like the product fragrance-reminds me of summer! It’s often the only product aside from some mascara, eyeliner that I wear daily. I am on my 4th tube over the years! It’s long-lasting too.
customer_reviews.author: Junebug Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: It is lightly tinted, moisturizes well, and I love how my skin feels after I put it on. Expensive, but worth it to me, especially when I want some light coverage in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Montana

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to apply
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I can moisturize and even my skin tone a bit without having to do foundation daily. After my first application I feel it is difficult to apply. Very dry even for my oily skin. I will try again, but doesn't seem like it is the product for me and unfortunately it appears it cannot be returned. Also, according to Jane Iredale's website, based on the foundation I use (PurePressed Base Mineral Foundation in Suntan) I was supposed to buy the medium on this product, which i did. However this is too gold for me.
customer_reviews.author: Palila

customer_reviews.title: Not for some allergy sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I like the mousse consistency of this tinted moisturizer. It does not cover everything, but I went with a tinted moisturizer to get rid of the cakey look. My only complaint is that it seems to aggravate my allergies. My eyes would well up with tears that would literally run down my face. If you have sensitive skin or allergies.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Look super natural. I mix the two colors together for a spot on match.
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much. I bought the light medium & the medium. I’m super white (fair) yucky but sometimes the fair is just to white looking on me. I mix these together for an exact match.
customer_reviews.author: ireland22

customer_reviews.title: Say hello to radiant skin
customer_reviews.text: I have never worn makeup, but after reaching 40, my skin became slightly blotchy, and I searched for a very lightweight tinted moisturizer. This moisturizer smooths out the ruddy color without the feeling of heavy makeup. You do not need much of it for the effect. I find that 20 minutes after application, my skin positively glows. I get compliments on my face all the time now. My favorite part is that it also provides sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! I use it everyday and it is not to harsh on my rosacea. Unfortunately, I do have those days where my rosacea is pretty bad and this doesn't give me the coverage I need. So if your looking for coverage, this is not it. But if your looking for a lightweight moisturizer with a sheer tint that makes your skin look amazing, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J.

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a light coverage foundation, try this!
customer_reviews.text: As I get older, I've found that typical makeup foundations are too thick and just look bad on me. I've been trying to find something that will give me a light, even coverage and I think I've found it. The bonus is that it moisturizes as well. It's easy to apply and I like the way it evens out my skin color.
customer_reviews.author: Deeva Shopper

customer_reviews.title: what a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I have been using liquid makeup for 45 years.This is the worst ever.Product was not smooth and left light colored bits in my pores.Over scented -terrible.I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and blends well
customer_reviews.text: I use this mixed with a few drops of primer oil to hydrate my fave before applying makeup. It's lightweight and blends well. IT doesn't give much coverage, but I don't use it for that, I use it more for SPF and moisture.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: Good but different
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have been using it for years now. This is the fact rest time I have purchased it from Amazon and unfortunately the texture is a tiny bit gritty which I have never experienced before. Still works.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I had had face surgery and it was suggested I use this product as it is natural and would help cover the discoloration I have after the surgery. I will continue to use this product long after I am healed as it is good for my skin and looks so natural.
customer_reviews.author: cal

customer_reviews.title: It is fabulous just enough cover
customer_reviews.text: It is just like light layer that blends in and is gentle on your skin
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Look fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that evens skin tone subtly so you don’t look like you are wearing foundation! It’s a tinted moisturizer with SPF 15. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Artist-writer customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: I used this before when I purchased from a local Med spa & I loved it. This was not the same stuff
customer_reviews.author: Jaylee

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Goes on smooth, and lasts a long time. I have sensitive skin and this does not bother me at all. The variety of tints is a plus. Very good sun protection for only an spf 15. I’m a redhead and need to stay protected.
customer_reviews.author: fayevb

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tinted moisturizer. When you first put it on, it looks pretty yellow - but give it a few minutes, the color will adapt to your skin. The yellow in this moisturizer reduces any redness in your skin. So easy in the morning to wash my face, then apply this - and I'm good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Reine

customer_reviews.title: Love this moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage without being too heavy and gentle for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Hmm...not so good
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to apply even with moisturizer on. Matte finish but may as well be putting on powder mineral makeup with brush—no wait!—That’s actually a whole lot easier!!
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and Itchy!
customer_reviews.text: I had to stop using this after the first few days. Firstly, because my skin and eyes became very itchy. Secondly, there is so little coverage, it’s a sunscreen. It has a very strong fragrance. Just buy a better sunscreen and look for another tinted moisturizer, BB Cream or foundation. It’s very over priced too.
customer_reviews.author: Elesiva

customer_reviews.title: The color is NOT a dark medium as in my sample
customer_reviews.text: The color of this product is completely off. I got a sample of the dark medium which was several shades darker than this tube. It did say "Dark Medium" on the tube but it definitely is not dark medium. I compared it with some of my other jane iredale products and I would say it is more of a "Light". Frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of all things Jane. I sometimes top this with the pure pressed powder for extra coverage. It is a little pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Grause

customer_reviews.title: Great Tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: The only one I can use, it's not drying the skin. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: NoriK

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smoothly, doesn't cake, but still covers. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: JMA

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent
customer_reviews.text: Light coverage and not drying but strongly scented. Smells like laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Pria

customer_reviews.title: Smells and looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this product. It smells cheap as if the plastic tube stayed in the sun too long. The texture doesn't apply well. The tone is slightly yellow which makes for a sick complexion. Don't recommend on 40 yo dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light coverage for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Love the Jane Iredale line. Perfect for my sensitive skin. Very natural coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Cyan

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Lighter Than Expected For The Medium Dark
customer_reviews.text: I use Jane Iredale Pressed Powder Foundation plus I have used her liquid face foundations. I bought this Tinted Moisturizer mostly to use on my legs. It looks very natural (not a fake tan look) & gives just enough color to enhance the look of my legs as they are very pale & pinkish/redish. This will do the trick until I eventually get some tan. I would prefer unscented so I could use it as a face makeup base while camping in bear country, but the scent is fine for other places. I avoid using certain ingredients on my sensitive skin. Jane Iredale products have excellent ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine S

customer_reviews.title: I think I'm in serious like!
customer_reviews.text: Well. damn!0.0.3 Well, damn! It's the right shade and it doesn't settle/show pores at 5 pm! Huh! I'd been using the bare minerals gel cream and noticing a pore MAGNIFICATION when I got home after work. Not Good. So I popped over to Paul's Choice to look around and discovered a few things that might work differently - for someone who wasn't hung up on fragrance, sustainabiltiy or what ever the fad of the week is - just DON'T sink into my pores, OK? This seems to be a nice choice for moisture, color/non-color (did I mention I'm glow in the dark white?) and lack of fragrance. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: terrorcotta

customer_reviews.title: Repeat User
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years. Provides great, natural looking coverage.
customer_reviews.author: jes

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I don't wear makeup daily but wanting something very light to just even my skin tone a little. This product is very light and goes on super smooth all over and it's so quick because I just smooth it over with my fingers like a face moisturizer
customer_reviews.author: shelby brown

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Good color. Goes on easy. My face feels slightly caked by the end of the day, but it washes off well. It has a strong smell at first but fades pretty quickly
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic tinted moistuizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this tinted moisturizer. It is sheer, yet smooths over the uneven color on my face. I doesn't make me break out and helps keep my acne prone face hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Pinelli

customer_reviews.title: My favorite make up
customer_reviews.text: This product lives up to its name as a "Dream Tint" for me! It doesn't irritate my super sensitive skin or eyes and the color makes my skin look beautiful. My skin has yellow undertones and pale, with light freckles and strawberry blond red hair. It is not easy finding colors that work with that tricky combination. This gives me color while covering imperfections; it brightens and doesn't look caked on. I use a serum, then apply this over the serum. I don't have to apply anything else beforehand or after as this moisturizes and provides SPF protection. It's quick, easy, and really pretty on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: LeilaniAZ

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I use it over sunscreen that leaves my face white. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jsdunada

customer_reviews.title: Not so smooth
customer_reviews.text: I used all my Jane iredale tinted moisturizer and bought this thinking it was the exact same product but I am not so sure it is the same. The color appears to be a bit lighter and it is not as creamy or moist as my last moisturizer. I like the product but I mix it with additional moisturizer to make it easier to apply.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Feels great on the face
customer_reviews.text: Another terrific Jane Iredale product. Goes on smooth and feels light on the skin, with just a little color. The SPF 15 is a plus, too.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Wangler

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy a tinted moisturizer that doesn't irritate my skin and is natural.
customer_reviews.author: Amber B.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. I was advised to apply with a brush and I love the way it goes on. Not heavy when applied this way.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Surprised my wife , order this through AMZ.... Can't miss
customer_reviews.author: Bigun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage, light feel, smells natural and not like perfume.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just me...the medium light is too pale and the medium is way too dark.
customer_reviews.author: Tearose

customer_reviews.title: Amazon does not send you Dream Tint. You get a product called Smooth Affair
customer_reviews.text: The Dream Tint product is great. However, Amazon replaces it with a product by Jane Iredale called Smooth Affair with no spf 15 coverage. This has happened twice and I have had to return them both times.
customer_reviews.author: Moira C Garvey

customer_reviews.title: Gave it to my granddaughter who really liked it.
customer_reviews.text: Color was not as expected. Was lighter than needed. Gave it to my granddaughter who really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite moisturizer/BB cream. It goes on easily and the light shade matches my fair skin perfectly. I experienced no skin irritation.
customer_reviews.author: KarenC

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and even this made me break out.
customer_reviews.author: Chryyyst

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have oily and sensitive skin and I'm so bummed it made me break out. Covers nothing
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: By far my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Jane Iredale is the only brand that does not make me break out. I can literally sleep in it! This is perfect for me because it combines SPF, moisturizer and a light coverage that I back up with a dusting of the pressed base and a little circle delete for problem areas. Super quick and easy to apply, I can not live without this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: D R

customer_reviews.title: Has the formula for this changed in the last year or so?
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the Lilac Brightener in the past with success but this time was different. The bottle has changed and the product itself seemed to be a creamier texture with less coverage (read none) and it is now more of a primer imo than a tinted moisturiser. Also, every time I used it I broke out. I can only assume it has been reformulated and the new formulation does not agree with my skin. It was bad enough that I ended up returning it. It's a shame because I love the Purepressed Base as well as colour cosmetics from this company and the fact that their products are non-toxic and cruelty free.
customer_reviews.author: zero347

customer_reviews.title: This is the only make up I wear. It ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only make up I wear. It does not cake and it's smooth. It lasts me about 3-6months!!! So it is so worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Product possibly out of date. No date code on box.
customer_reviews.text: Does not apply smoothly. E Watched application video online. Seemed to always cake even using a small amount. Did apply Cera Vie moisturizer before application of product. Would not purchase again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really love it but would like a product with a higher ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love it but would like a product with a higher SPF from 15 to 30 for the face...Difficult to find, but appreciate the clean components used...Color is great and blends well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I began using it from a sample my anestitician gave me.  She found the perfect match.
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way and has helped my skin's texture. Has not caused any breakouts for me, and I'm prone with any moisturizer. Helps even my skin tone and in summer it's all I wear- no foundation on top. It's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: DianeH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this tinted moisturizer. I wear it year round in Florida as my foundation.
customer_reviews.author: eyewonit

customer_reviews.title: I love the way this product smells but I can't use ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this product smells but I can't use it. I got a rash. It is a shame because my doctor gave me a list of products I could use and this is one of them. I was not cheap - much more then I normally spend. So disappointing..
customer_reviews.author: coletta scc

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. CVS sells much better at less the price. Returned same day.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Pollack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the light bright natural look. This is my 3rd or 4th tube.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Brown

customer_reviews.title: JANE IREDALE DREAM TINT WITH SPF
customer_reviews.text: USED THIS BEFORE AND WORKS FAIRLY WELL, ALTHOUGH FEEL MAYBE SOMEWHAT DRYING OF THE SKIN, PERHAPS NOW THAT I AM OLDER, NEED A LITTLE MORE MOISTURE INSTEAD.
customer_reviews.author: dr sunshine

customer_reviews.title: All in one box !
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years. Usually order from Iredale directly. First time from Amazon and combined with 3 other items. Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hess

customer_reviews.title: been using this for quite a while
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful. I like it because it goes on smooth and does not feel oily or greasy at all. The other thing I like about this is the smaller size. It's nice not to have a large tube of this because I usually change "tints" between summer and winter.
customer_reviews.author: bassetlvr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years on my sensitive skin. Perfect shade for my fair complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the only "foundation" I use. Very light and natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Takes quite a bit of product to cover, not terribly moisturizing, would not rebuy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amie cashman

customer_reviews.title: too thick and greasy
customer_reviews.text: i have very dry skin and this was too thick and greasy for me. it made my face look like an oil slick and has an extremely unpleasant smell to it.
customer_reviews.author: Rants&Raves

customer_reviews.title: Color just right
customer_reviews.text: When added to another product it gives me a year-round color. It is smooth, easy to apply and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Popcorn lover

customer_reviews.title: Best of its kind on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this for several years...I like how it feels on my skin and does not clog the pores. It s one of the best on the market, in my opinion, for a lightweight foundation that moisturizes.
customer_reviews.author: Lrm5

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love all of the Jane Iredale products in general, and this one doesn't disappoint. It is a light formula and can be used as a sunscreen or as a base under your powder while still giving you UV production.
customer_reviews.author: SArchey

customer_reviews.title: Dang near perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great tinted moisturizer with excellent color matching/blending. I have extremely sensitive skin with eczema on top of allergies. My dermatologist and allergist have both advised me against any make up at all, but I find a little Jane Iredale is fine - after all it was developed by a dermatologist. My only complaint is that I wish it was a bit richer moisturizer. It's light and gives good coverage but looks like you're wearing nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Toni D.

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my new winter foundation
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my new winter foundation. Perfectly moisturizing for my oily skin.! I probably would not use this in the summer though, but switch to her powder foundation instead.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Turpin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth and is a great base if using a powder foundation. Long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: GMarilyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love this just wish it was a little darker
customer_reviews.author: Jlfeller

customer_reviews.title: Color is wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I usually love this product! I have been using it for years! It is a totally different color than normal! I will not order this from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: my Washington

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and effective.
customer_reviews.text: A little goes along way. Softens skin imperfections. A foundation you don't feel all day..And serves as a sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: genpen

customer_reviews.title: Love this. I use it with her mineral powder
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I use it with her mineral powder. Great light finish that still smooths out how my skin looks, and it feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks very pretty on. I can go without powder. I love the color of the tint. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra W. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Love all Jane Iredale products for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Love all Jane Iredale products for my sensitive skin. Jane Iredale eye makeup and mascara is the only kind I can use. Love this moisturizer!
customer_reviews.author: Del shopper

customer_reviews.title: Makeup made easy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Have been using it for years. Foolproof for the minimalist.
customer_reviews.author: Dog-N-PonyShow

customer_reviews.title: Too little coverage for too much money
customer_reviews.text: I am unimpressed with this product, especially for the price. The coverage is uneven and the texture is somewhat chalky. For the price, Laura Mercier tinted moisturizer is a much better buy.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Weller

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Jane Iredale products are great. This product smooths my skin without irritating it. Gives your sensitive skin a nice glow and canvas for applying your foundation. Try this product, you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnette

customer_reviews.title: This Works for Me
customer_reviews.text: This product serves as a cream and adds some color so I look like I have a little suntan.
customer_reviews.author: Dorset, VT Resident

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Jane Iredale products that I have used are great.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A. Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Hardly a Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and returned one of the two because I felt it was more drying to my senior skin than a moisturizer. I kept the first tube because I used it but didn't hesitate to return the second one for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: maryelizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I still use powder over it, but it provides a smooth finish for the powder.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Galliart

customer_reviews.title: Great to have this delivered to my door
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand due to giving me a natural look and also being a moisturizer and sunblock. I really liked the fact that it was delivered to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Lusica Hankins

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time user of Jane Iredale Dream Tint Moisturizer. I have sensitive skin & Jane Iredale products work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dar T

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have olive skin and don't like using foundation this is a wonderful cover up cream that just feels like a cream smooths out and help cover up some lines
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Good moisture content and consistent
customer_reviews.text: I like this moisture tint and it has been consistent over the years in delivery. The SPF level is a great benefit as well. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer Since 2002

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Love the subtle tint of color it gives my face!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Nosko

customer_reviews.title: Wondering if reviews are for a different product...
customer_reviews.text: Does not seem tinted at all. Smells and looks just like sunscreen. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy, nice to smell, coverage. Soft, almost iridescent glow. Feels good, looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Cincerely

product_meta.title: jane iredale Dream Tint Tinted Moisturizer
product_meta.description:
Color:MediumFormulated with lightweight minerals, a tinted moisturizer that not only hydrates and provides sheer to medium coverage, but helps prevent trans-epidermal water loss. Calms and soothes. Water resistant to 40 minutes.SPF 15 broad spectrum (UVA/UVB) sun protection. Gives a soft-focus effect that helps minimize the appearance of fine lines and enlarged pores. Reef safe.

BRAND STORY
jane iredale is a comprehensive line of mineral makeup developed to enhance the lives of women by delivering personal, natural beauty to lift her health and spirit.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
